remarks: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit substitution (deduction version of ~ sbieh ).  New proofs should use ~ sbied instead. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-1994.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-May-2011.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
sbiedh.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. x ph ) $.
sbiedh.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( ch -> A. x ch ) ) $.
sbiedh.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( x = y -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) ) $.
sbiedh $p |- ( ph -> ( [ y / x ] ps <-> ch ) ) $.
